fullplot: A slick New York publicist who picks up a ringing receiver in a phone booth is told that if he hangs up, he'll be killed... and the little red light from a laser rifle sight is proof that the caller isn't kidding.
plot: Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.
title: Phone Booth

tomatoes.consensus: Quick pacing and Farrell's performance help make Phone Booth a tense nail-biter.
